name: Car Crash! 3D
description:
A car crashing game "Car Crash 3D"!

Game Features:

● EASY TO PLAY
Playable with one-hand!
Just swipe the screen to drive and crash other cars!

● INVINCIBLE MODE
Fill the gauge to enter INVINCIBLE MODE and crush larger cars!

● PLAY AT YOUR FREE TIME
No need to be a rocket scientist to play the game!

● FREE TO PLAY
Get all the cars completely free!
